title: Sergio Ramos
summary: Sergio Ramos García (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈseɾxjo ˈramoz ɣaɾˈθi.a];[upper-alpha 1] born 30 March 1986) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain and the Spain national team.[3] He most notably played as a centre-back for Real Madrid for 16 seasons,[4] whom he captained for six seasons.[5][6] He has previously played as a right-back earlier in his career.[7] Known for his goalscoring capabilities and leadership skills, he is widely considered as one of the greatest defenders and captains in the history of the sport.[8][9][10][11][12][13][14][15]
